abstract: America is 17th in communications technology according to a U.N. agency. A similar study had the country at No. 1. Study methodologies vary as much as countries do.
snippet: America is 17th in communications technology according to a U.N. agency. A similar study had the country at No. 1. Study methodologies vary as much as countries do.
lead_paragraph: Last month, I wrote about one ranking of technology and communications that put the United States at the top of the world. The United Nations has chimed in with its own ranking that places this country further back in the pack at No. 17.

headline.main: U.N. Says U.S. Internet & Telecom Lags, but It’s Cheap
